title.narrative: Implementation of Global Health Support Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Implementation of Global Health Support Programme) is a component of Global Health Support Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £11,086,903. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Medical research. , with the following implementing partners: MannionDaniels, Ministry of Health - China, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 17-09-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
